+ **--classified--**

[[/=]]
[[div style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between;"]]
[[div style="width: 48%; padding: 10px; background-color: #222222;"]]
[[div style="border: 2px solid #ff0000; padding: 10px; background-color: #222222; border-radius: 10px;"]]

BIO:

I possess an artistic style that mixes dissonance and grace, drawing inspiration from AniManga, dark Symbolism, and surrealism. My approach extends across various domains, from traditional art to virtual reality (VR), digital art, and 3D/2D animation development using UE4. I work in the video game industry, specializing in art direction for VR games and indie games.


[[/div]]
